quote: If it's important to them, it's important. I've had certain clients where the one spouse says, 'excuse my husband or wife, they're going to have all these dumb questions about things that are not important,' and I have to explain that if it's something they're worried about, then it's important.
why_clipworthy: Highlights the importance of empathy and understanding client concerns, which resonates with many agents.
suggested_hook: Why every client question matters more than you think.
